com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util

Class ClientLoginHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util.ClientLoginHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClientLoginHelper

    public class ClientLoginHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements IClientLoginHelper
    Helper to manage ClientLogin authentications tokens. This interacts with the Google Account manager to add the client login specific Authentication headers on each http request. (Inspired by chenplim's "comm" package)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientLoginHelper

        public ClientLoginHelper(Activity activity,
                         java.lang.String service,
                         java.lang.String prompt,
                         HttpClient client)
        Create one of these for each HttpClient needing clientlogin authentication.
        Parameters:
        activity - An activity that can be used for user interaction.
        service - The application service class (e.g. "fusiontables").
        prompt - The user prompt (if needed) to choose an account.
        client - The HttpClient to use (or null for a default one).

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
                 throws ClientProtocolException
        Initialize the token, prompting the user for an account as needed. This can block waiting for user action, so it can't be on the UI thread
        Throws:
        ClientProtocolException

      • isUiThread

        private boolean isUiThread()

      • execute

        public HttpResponse execute(HttpUriRequest request)
                     throws ClientProtocolException,
                            java.io.IOException
        Wraps an HttpClient.execute() to manage the authorization headers. This will add the proper Authorization header, and retry if the auth token has expired.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface IClientLoginHelper
        Throws:
        ClientProtocolException
        java.io.IOException

      • forgetAccountName

        public void forgetAccountName()
        Forget about the account the user chose. The AccountChooser remembers (in shared prefs) the chosen account. Call this if you want to change the account this service is associated with.
        Specified by:
        forgetAccountName in interface IClientLoginHelper

      • addGoogleAuthHeader

        private static void addGoogleAuthHeader(HttpUriRequest request,
                                        java.lang.String token)

      • removeGoogleAuthHeaders

        private static void removeGoogleAuthHeaders(HttpUriRequest request)

      • getAuthToken

        public java.lang.String getAuthToken()
                              throws ClientProtocolException
        Uses Google Account Manager to retrieve auth token that can be used to access various Google APIs -- e.g., the Google Voice api.
        Specified by:
        getAuthToken in interface IClientLoginHelper
        Throws:
        ClientProtocolException
